ac.descricao: is a multinational telecommunications company operating a robust global backbone network, providing access to major IXPs, Tier 1 operators and global content providers.
ac.presencadescricao: TelCables West Africa is powered by the Angola Cables network, a multinational telecommunications company operating in the wholesale market.​ The company operates connectivity, IT solutions and services as well as international data circuit capacity and IP Transit via submarine cables.​ As the most connected network operator in Africa, we provide secure, low-latency direct routings from West Africa to the USA and South America and from West Africa to London.​ With our presence across a number of Nigerian IP hubs from Lekki, WACS CLS, Medallion DC, Rack Centre and others, and connections across Africa via the Djoliba network, we can connect your business to the world.
servicos.cloud.headline: IaaS | Backup | STaaS
servicos.cloud.desc: 100% Locally Resident cloud; billed in Nigerian Naira delivered in different model including dedicated private cloud
servicos.connectivity.desc: High-performance connectivity solutions to support the needs of enterprises and service providers
servicos.seguranca.headline: Anti-DDoS
servicos.seguranca.desc: DDoS Protection and Firewall-as-a-Service; security solution for physical and cloud infrastrucutre
fique.atento: Stay tuned to our agenda and know where the
conectada.mundo: 23rd most interconnected operator in the world
ad.descricao:
Any questions you may have or information you need,
we will be available to answer.
accionistas.description: Angola Cables, S.A., is an Angolan legal entity, with headquarters at Rua das Quipacas, House No. 186, Ingombota District and Municipality, Luanda, Angola.
datacenter.titulo: Tier III infrastructure within a global low-latency network.
datacenter.desc: ANGONAP Datacenters from Angolacables are designed with high security standards, expansion capacity and energy redundancy capable of providing hosting services and continuous connectivity.
visita.desc: Take a tour of the Angonap facilities.
qual.datacenter: Which datacenter would you like to visit?
menu-angolacables: Angola Cables is a multinational telecommunications company with offices in more than 7 cities, 5 countries and over 200 employees from various backgrounds and cultures. We have a network covering 4 continents of the Atlantic.
empresa.header_title: We connect West Africa to the world.
empresa.historia.title: OUR HISTORY
empresa.historia.description: is a multinational telecommunications company that offers advanced global connectivity solutions through a robust infrastructure of submarine cables, data centers and interconnection points.
empresa.timeline.2009: Angola Cables was born from the WACS cable consortium and with it the vision to connect Angola to the world
empresa.timeline.2010: We began construction of the Sangano CLS, an infrastructure milestone with international technical quality
empresa.timeline.2011: We inaugurated the AngoNAP Luanda Data Center in Luanda
empresa.timeline.2012: The WACS cable and AngoNAP began operations, marking the start of our commercial activity
empresa.timeline.2013: We received the Quality and Excellence Award and were present at major industry events
empresa.timeline.2014: We advanced with the ADC Data Center and Monet Cable projects
empresa.timeline.2015: We introduced Angola Cables to Brazil and created the idea of a Technology Hub in Fortaleza
empresa.timeline.2016: The Monet cable arrives in Brazil
empresa.timeline.2017: We began construction of the Fortaleza Data Center and launched the SACS cable
empresa.timeline.2018: We connected 2 continents Americas - Africa with the Monet and SACS cables in operation
empresa.timeline.2019: We certified the Monet CLS with international quality and inaugurated the Fortaleza Data Center
empresa.timeline.2021: We innovated with new digital products and IP variations and Anti_DDoS (layer 7)
empresa.timeline.2022: 3x infrastructure growth We launched Clouds2Africa, Clouds2Brasil and ACeleraNET We opened new PoPs in Singapore and Los Angeles
empresa.timeline.2023:
ISO 27001 Certifications
We reached the goal of 1% of the world's internet on our network
We had an average growth of 22% (EBITDA) over the three-year period
empresa.timeline.2024: Consolidation of our business and operations in subsidiaries in South Africa, Nigeria, Europe/Madeira and USA/Bermuda
empresa.valores.title: VALUES
empresa.valores.missao.title: MISSION
empresa.valores.missao.text: Lead digital connectivity in the South Atlantic and boost the growth of emerging markets.
empresa.valores.visao.title: VISION
empresa.valores.visao.text: Make Angola one of the main Telecommunications Hubs in Africa and accelerate digital transformation in South Atlantic countries.
empresa.valores.paixao.title: Passion
empresa.valores.paixao.text: We value the collective feeling of love for what we do. How each one gets involved for the final result is extremely important for it to reach the level of delivery we aspire to. We are all connected with irreverence, energy and pride in the company and the team. We transform the impossible into reality, because we are passionate about what we do.
empresa.valores.sustentabilidade.title: Sustainability
empresa.valores.sustentabilidade.text: We work thinking about the global impact in the present to sustain the future. Of the company, the businesses, the social and environmental projects, the communities and markets where we operate. We are all connected with the planet and taking care of it is everyone's duty.
empresa.valores.talento.title: Talent
empresa.valores.talento.text: We value the collective feeling of love for what we do. How each one gets involved for the final result is extremely important for it to reach the level of delivery we aspire to. We are all connected with irreverence, energy and pride in the company and the team. We transform the impossible into reality, because we are passionate about what we do.
empresa.valores.eficiencia.title: Efficiency
empresa.valores.eficiencia.text: We are committed to the ethical and objective fulfillment of the organization's procedures and objectives. We manage our tools and resources using the highest standards and certifications to provide superior services to our business partners and customers. Our continuous investment in knowledge development and talent creation are the efficiency engines that fuel our growth and evolution.
equipa.title: OUR WEST AFRICA TEAM OF EXPERTS
equipa.description: Our sales team is here to help you with your business. They work daily so you can achieve your goals and have the best solutions, tailored to your needs and your business.
equipa.angelo_gama.name: ÂNGELO GAMA
equipa.jonadab.name: JONADAB BROWN
equipa.israel.name: ISRAEL OGBOI
equipa.eric.name: ERIC OWUSU
equipa.osibanjo.name: OSIBANJO OLALEKAN
equipa.babatunde.name: BABATUNDE ADEOYE
equipa.jonadab.bio: Jonadab Brown is Deputy Director at Telcables Nigeria, bringing over 30 years of leadership experience in telecommunications, IT systems, and business operations. He has a strong track record in driving revenue growth, forging international partnerships, and delivering large-scale connectivity solutions. With a background that spans senior roles at Shell, Schlumberger, and major telecom firms, Jonadab specializes in strategic sales, business development, and regulatory compliance. He holds a Master’s degree in Electrical/Electronics Engineering from the University of Benin and a Bachelor’s in Electrical Engineering from the University of Port Harcourt.
equipa.israel.bio: Israel Ogboi is a Presales Engineer at TelCables West Africa, where he designs tailored solutions in cloud services, network connectivity, and digital infrastructure. With over four years in telecoms, he supports enterprise clients across West Africa, aligning technical expertise with business objectives to drive digital transformation and connectivity growth in the region.​
equipa.osibanjo.bio: Osibanjo Olalekan is Sales Manager at TelCables West Africa, leveraging over 18 years of experience in B2B sales, account management, and strategic growth across telecommunications. He drives enterprise revenue through tailored solutions, high-value client relationships, and effective market strategies, delivering measurable results and sustainable business growth.​
equipa.eric.bio: Eric Owusu is Sales Account Manager for West and Central Africa at TelCables, with over 27 years of experience in the telecommunications industry, including 16 years in sales to major operators and multinational clients. He specializes in business development, account management, and strategic partnerships, having secured contracts across Africa with leading telecom and infrastructure providers.
equipa.babatunde.bio: Babatunde Adeoye is Sales Manager at Telcables West Africa, with over 20 years’ experience in telecoms and IT. He specializes in strategic partnerships, market expansion, and delivering innovative connectivity and cloud solutions across Africa.
equipa.angelo_gama.bio: Ângelo Gama has been CEO of Angola Cables since 2020. Graduated in Electrical and Computer Engineering from IST in Lisbon, he began his career as a technical support engineer at HP in Lisbon and has more than 21 years of experience in the telecommunications and information technology sectors. Throughout his career, he has been involved in important projects, such as the launch of Europe's first 3G mobile phone operator at Three Mobile in the UK, and the merger between HP and Compaq, in addition to having worked with Atos Origin in the Netherlands.
equipa.laura_carneiro.name: LAURA CARNEIRO
equipa.laura_carneiro.bio: Laura Carneiro has been an Administrator at Angola Cables since 2012, responsible for the Administrative and Financial area, where she plans, monitors and defines strategies according to the organization's goals. She previously worked at Startel and Mundo Telecomunicações. She has a degree in Financial Management from the Catholic University of Angola and a strategic leadership course. With skills in communication, problem solving and team leadership.
equipa.rui_faria.name: RUI FARIA
equipa.rui_faria.bio: Manager with more than 25 years of experience in IT, Communication and Telecommunications, specialized in business strategies, structuring projects, marketing and communication intelligence. With a successful track record in delivering impactful programs, he has contributed to the transformation and growth of the companies where he has worked, positioning them as leaders in the national and international market. He has demonstrated competence and ethics in managing human resources, customer contracts and asset returns. Fluent in Portuguese and English, facilitating expansion in international markets. Specialties: Business strategies, project management, market analysis, product development and internationalization.
equipa.sergio_pozuelo.name: SERGIO POZUELO
equipa.sergio_pozuelo.bio: Sergio Pozuelo is an international executive with more than 20 years of experience in Sales and Marketing in the Telecommunications and IT sectors, working in various regions such as Europe, the Middle East, Africa and Latin America. Graduated in Telecommunications Engineering from the Polytechnic University of Madrid, with an MBA and a Master's degree in Marketing, he is Global Commercial Director of Angola Cables. He is responsible for the company's subsidiaries in Angola, Brazil, South Africa, Europe and the USA, leading commercial strategies and driving growth in international markets. Angola Cables is a multinational telecommunications company present in more than 5 countries
equipa.lucenildo_junior.name: LUCENILDO JUNIOR
equipa.lucenildo_junior.bio: Lucenildo Junior is Chief Technology Officer (CTO) of Angola Cables, with extensive experience in network development and management of complex global networks. Recognized for his deep knowledge and practical approach to solving network challenges, he is responsible for the company's IP/MPLS infrastructure and oversees the expansion of Angola Cables' global network. Lucenildo holds a master's degree in Computer Science and a doctorate in Electrical Engineering from the University of São Paulo. Before joining Angola Cables in 2019, he worked on research and development projects at NIC.br, RNP Brazil and G8 Networks. He is also an active member of NANOG and LACNIC.
equipa.julio_chilela.name: JÚLIO CHILELA
equipa.julio_chilela.bio: Júlio Chilela is Director of Digital Innovation at Angola Cables and a Cloud enthusiast. With extensive experience, he led the development of digital platforms and global projects, standing out for the implementation of the first Angolan public cloud with self-onboard, covering 6 regions in 4 countries (Angola, Nigeria, South Africa and Brazil). PhD candidate in Computer Science at the University of Porto and University of Houston, his research focuses on 'internet delivery via satellite with 5G networks and Cloud Core'. He holds a master's degree in Geographic Information Technologies from the University of Coimbra and experience in several international companies.
equipa.artur_mendes.name: ARTUR MENDES
equipa.artur_mendes.bio: Artur Mendes is VP of Sales at Angola Cables, with more than 20 years of experience in the global telecommunications sector. He joined the company in 2013, after 12 years at Nokia, where he held various positions at Nokia Mobile Phone and Nokia Multimedia Network Terminals. As VP of Sales, he is responsible for global strategy and business development, as well as managing relationships with key customers. Artur has extensive knowledge about important projects, such as the Monet and SACS submarine cables, and the modernization of the Angola Cables Data Center in Brazil, which integrates the landing stations of these cables.
equipa.frederico_oliveira.name: FREDERICO OLIVEIRA
equipa.frederico_oliveira.bio: Frederico Oliveira is Head of Engineering at Angola Cables, standing out in the administration and maintenance of IP and submarine networks. With experience in team management and collaboration with various suppliers, he leads the delivery of high-quality solutions. Throughout his career, he has focused his knowledge on corporate networks, service providers and telecommunications. Recognized for his persistence, resilience and adaptability, innovative solutions and proactive approaches to solving challenges in dynamic and challenging environments.
equipa.samuel_carvalho.name: SAMUEL CARVALHO
equipa.samuel_carvalho.bio: Samuel Carvalho is CMO of Angola Cables and holds a master's degree in Corporate Communication, a BA in Public Relations and Marketing, as well as certification in Transformational Leadership from the Lisbon MBA Program. With more than 18 years of experience in operational and marketing consulting for companies in the financial and FMCG sectors, he has built a solid career in marketing, media, advertising, brand management and communication strategies. Under his leadership, Angola Cables implemented the 'Global Deep Connection' strategy, promoting products such as CDN, IXP, Cloud Services, Data Centers and the submarine network that connects Africa to South America.
equipa.ariete_pereira.name: ARIETE PEREIRA
equipa.ariete_pereira.bio:
Ariete Pereira has more than 10 years of experience in commercial positions in the telecommunications sector and is currently Sales Leader at Angola Cables. She stands out in building solid and lasting relationships with customers around the world, offering consistent value and trust through reliable service and strategic partnerships.
Committed to generating exceptional value for partners, she seeks to ensure that her team is motivated and empowered to contribute to the growth and success of Angola Cables in the global telecommunications scenario.
equipa.hugo_gomes.name: HUGO GOMES
equipa.hugo_gomes.bio: He is a management professional with 29 years of experience in IT, technology strategy, consulting, security, solution sales, telecommunications and business development. With 27 years of experience in Africa, he began his career as a Junior Telecommunications Engineer in 1996 and held positions such as CTO, Sales and Pre-Sales Director, National Director, CEO, IT Manager and Pre-Sales Leader for enterprise systems in two SADC markets.
equipa.fernando_fernandes.name: FERNANDO FERNANDES
equipa.fernando_fernandes.bio:
Fernando Fernandes is CEO of TelCables Nigeria & West Africa, a subsidiary of Angola Cables, a global ICT solutions provider and Africa's most connected network operator. He is responsible for the management, development and expansion of TelCables operations in Nigeria and the West Africa region.
With extensive experience in the telecommunications sector, Fernando has stood out for his adaptable and innovative leadership, focused on expanding the company's network and improving service delivery. Appointed CEO in 2023, he played a key role in consolidating TelCables as a market leader in the region.
equipa.virgilio_alves.name: VIRGÍLIO ALVES
equipa.virgilio_alves.bio:
Virgílio Alves has more than 15 years of experience in Customer Experience (CX) and has been Post-Sales, Operations and Channels Leader at Angola Cables for 5 years. Focused on strategic and operational solutions, he seeks to enhance the customer experience.
With extensive experience in the telecommunications and mobile operator sector, he adopts a practical and results-oriented approach, always customer-centric. Member of the Customer Experience Professionals Association (CXPA), he contributes to the transformation of processes, teams and technologies, ensuring that each point of contact provides a smooth, efficient and memorable experience.
equipa.sudhir_juggernath.name: SUDHIR JUGGERNAUTH
equipa.sudhir_juggernath.bio:
Sudhir Juggernath is CEO of TelCables Southern & East Africa, a subsidiary of Angola Cables, a global ICT solutions provider and Africa's most connected network operator. He is responsible for the management, development and expansion of TelCables operations in the Southern and East Africa regions.
With 20 years of experience in the telecommunications and technology sector, Sudhir has a track record of strategic positions in companies such as Siemens, Neotel, BT Global Services and Orange, with a focus on business development.
Appointed CEO in September 2023, he is known for his analytical vision and ability to negotiate and generate market opportunities.
equipa.mahen_mahido.name: Mahen Naidu
equipa.mahen_mahido.bio: Telecommunications professional with more than 10 years of experience in Solution Architecture, Product Development and Pricing Modeling. He stands out for his effective communication and strong performance with customers and partners. He has an innovative profile, always focused on adding value to internal and external business requirements. He is organized, reliable and able to manage multiple priorities with a positive attitude, demonstrating proactivity and commitment to team goals.
equipa.guilherme_vieira.name: Guilherme Viveira
slideshow.video_alt_text: Your browser does not support the missing video
slideshow.slide1.title: Our submarine cables are installed in the depths of the ocean, respecting the habitat of turtles and preserving the ecosystem for future generations.
slideshow.slide1.description: We make every possible investment so that our operations continue to preserve the seas and oceans, as well as the species that inhabit them, namely the Kitabanga turtles which are endangered.
datacenter.titulo_principal: Tier III internet access infrastructure with flexible capacity within a global, efficient and low-latency network.
datacenter.descricao_principal: ANGONAP Datacenters from Angolacables are designed with high security standards, expansion capacity and energy redundancy capable of providing hosting services and continuous connectivity.
datacenter.marcar_visita_descricao: Take a tour of the Angonap facilities. Discover the computing power, resilience, security and connection we can make available to your company
datacenter.modal_titulo: Virtual tour of ANGONAP Data Centers
datacenter.modal_descricao: Allow us to get to know you before taking you on this virtual tour.
datacenter.form_qual_datacenter: Which Data Center would you like to visit?
angonap_card_descricao: Neutral and certified data center in Angola, with colocation, connectivity and cloud services, guaranteeing high availability, security and scalability for companies.
managed_services_card_descricao: Complete management of IT infrastructures, with monitoring, support and proactive maintenance, allowing companies to focus on their core business.
global_data_center_interconnection_card_: GDI is a dedicated multipoint service that connects Points of Presence (PoPs) within Angola Cables' global network, ensuring high performance, security and reliability for critical operations on an international scale, with specialized technical support and cutting-edge infrastructure for maximum efficiency and availability.
eventos_conectando_mundo: We are connecting the whole world with our work.
blog_subtitulo: Here are all the solutions prepared for you.
conectividade_subtitulo_parte1: Fast and efficient access to the main
conectividade_subtitulo_parte2: digital networks and hubs in the world.
gdi_descricao: Private and secure connection between global data centers, ideal for synchronization and efficient data exchange.
ip_transit_descricao: High-performance international connectivity, guaranteeing fast and reliable access to the global internet with low latency and high availability.
dia_descricao: Dedicated internet access with guaranteed bandwidth, ideal for companies that demand stability, constant speed and specialized support.
ip_gamer_descricao: Solution optimized for gamers and gaming platforms, with direct routes and low latency for a smoother and faster gaming experience.
ip_exchange_descricao: Efficient interconnection between operators for the exchange of national and international IP traffic, with high quality of service.
remote_peering_descricao: Remote access to international traffic exchange points (such as LINX, DE-CIX, etc.), without the need for physical presence, with optimized performance.
transporte_descricao: High-capacity and secure data transport service between data centers, countries and continents, through our robust submarine cable network.
acloud_connect_descricao: Direct and private connection to major cloud platforms (such as AWS, Azure and Google Cloud), with greater security, speed and performance.
dark_fiber_descricao: Dedicated optical fiber infrastructure, without active equipment, allowing total control of the network and expansion as needed.
angonix_descricao: Neutral traffic exchange point (IXP) in Angola that improves local routing, reduces latency and increases network efficiency.
pix_descricao: Local infrastructure that allows the interconnection of operators and ISPs to improve content delivery and reduce transit costs.
gestao_simplificada_titulo: Simplified management and maximized performance for your business​
sap_business_one_descricao: Integrated ERP management system for small and medium-sized companies, which centralizes financial, sales, inventory and operations processes, promoting efficiency and growth.
sap_ecobizz_descricao: Digital invoicing and business management platform in the cloud, simple and accessible, designed for SMEs and entrepreneurs in Angola.
cloud_subtitulo_pagina: The right cloud services for your company to grow without limits.
clouds2africa_descricao: Optimized connectivity between cloud platforms and the African continent, with low latency, high availability and guaranteed performance.
clouds2brasil_descricao: Direct and efficient connection between data centers in Brazil and cloud services, ensuring speed, stability and security in accessing critical applications.
host2africa_descricao: Web hosting and cloud server service, with infrastructure located in Africa, guaranteeing proximity, low latency and greater control for digital businesses on the continent.
backups2africa_descricao: Advanced storage, processing and database management services, guaranteeing security, agility, cost optimization and performance maximization. Customized solutions for companies looking for scalability, operational efficiency and specialized technical support, with cutting-edge infrastructure and high availability for critical operations.
backups2brasil_descricao: The best gaming experience with reduced latency, connecting directly to the main global servers and guaranteeing superior performance, stability, quality and a reliable connection for the most demanding players, with dedicated support, access to cutting-edge platforms and optimized routing for maximum efficiency.
vods2africa_descricao: Efficient distribution of on-demand videos (VoD) with delivery optimized for the African public, through local routes and high-performance connections.
shields2africa_descricao: Advanced protection against DDoS attacks with local mitigation in Africa, guaranteeing resilience, stability and security for digital infrastructures on the continent.
shields2brasil_descricao: DDoS defense solution with direct mitigation in Brazil, ensuring real-time protection and continuity of online services with high availability.
virtualizacao_subtitulo_pagina: Redefine your infrastructure with advanced virtual network solutions.
virtual_router_descricao: Virtualized routing in a cloud environment, with flexibility, scalability and centralized management for modern business networks.
sd_wan_descricao: Intelligent network solution that optimizes traffic between sites and clouds, with greater control, security and performance in real time.
premios_titulo_parte1: WE DON'T SEEK AWARDS, BUT WE

We have a network that covers the 4 continents of the Atlantic. Angola Cables is today a company prepared for the challenges of digitalisation with the infrastructure and human talent to operate in any market.

connectivity-service-desc: Connectivity solutions to different endpoints - internet, global nodes or cloud infrastructure.

company.name: Angola Cables
privacy.policies.title: Privacy Policies
privacy.policies.purpose.title: Purpose
privacy.policies.purpose.paragraph1: Angola Cables' (AC) Data Privacy Policy aims to ensure the protection of privacy and the rights of Data Subjects regarding the collection, use, storage, and sharing of their Personally Identifiable Information (PII) in relation to its employees, third parties, and contracts.
privacy.policies.purpose.paragraph2: AC's website collects and uses certain personal data to enable service delivery and improve the user experience.
privacy.policies.scope.title: Purview/Scope
privacy.policies.scope.intro: This Data Privacy Policy applies to all personal data processing activities carried out by AC, including:
privacy.policies.scope.individuals.title: a) Covered Individuals
privacy.policies.scope.individuals.item2: Customers, suppliers, partners, and any third parties who provide data to AC or whose data is processed by AC;
privacy.policies.scope.individuals.item3: Users of AC websites, portals, applications, and other digital platforms.
privacy.policies.scope.dataTypes.title: b) Types of Data Covered
privacy.policies.scope.dataTypes.item1: Personal Data and Sensitive Personal Data, as defined by applicable legislation;
privacy.policies.scope.dataTypes.item2: Personally Identifiable Information (PII) collected through physical or digital means;
privacy.policies.scope.dataTypes.item3: Data obtained directly (provided by the data subject) or indirectly (cookies, logs, internal systems, integrations, etc.)
privacy.policies.scope.activities.title: c) Covered Activities
privacy.policies.scope.activities.intro: This policy covers all stages of the personal data life cycle, including:
privacy.policies.scope.areas.title: d) Covered Areas and Systems
privacy.policies.scope.areas.item1: All directorates/departments, business units and AC subsidiaries;
privacy.policies.scope.areas.item2: Internal systems, databases, IT infrastructures, networks, online platforms, and cloud environments used by AC.
privacy.policies.scope.legislation.title: e) Legislation and Standards Considered
privacy.policies.scope.legislation.conte: This policy is aligned with the laws and regulations applicable in all countries where AC operates, including ISO 27001 and 27701 good practices.
privacy.policies.personalData.title: Personal Data
privacy.policies.personalData.definition: Personal Data refers to any information that can be used to identify an individual, including, but not limited to, a first and last name, a residential address (or other physical address), an email address, or other contact information.
privacy.policies.personalData.commitment: AC recognizes the importance of protecting Personal Data and is committed to processing it lawfully, transparently, and securely. As part of its activities, AC may collect different types of information that identify an individual, whether for service delivery, commercial interaction, professional relationship management, or internal recruitment processes.
privacy.policies.personalData.collection: AC requests personal information when a data subject requests products or services, registers to receive materials, or performs other activities. When visiting AC's website and completing forms, the data subject may provide the following information, depending on the type of form: name, email, phone number, profession, company, city, state. This information will be used to send marketing content and proposals, to subscribe them to our newsletter, or to contact them by phone.
privacy.policies.personalData.jobApplica: For job applicants, AC asks them to provide information such as academic background, professional experience, and career interests.
privacy.policies.otherInfo.title: Other User Information
privacy.policies.otherInfo.content: AC may access technical information about the data subject's browsing activity on the website through cookies and logs, such as IP address, geolocation, referral source, browser type, visit duration, and pages visited.
privacy.policies.dataUse.title: Use of Data
privacy.policies.dataUse.commitment: AC undertakes to use Personal Data responsibly, transparently, and in line with legitimate purposes previously communicated to data subjects. All processing activities are conducted in accordance with the principles of necessity, proportionality, and security, ensuring that the information collected is used only for authorized purposes and within applicable legal limits.
privacy.policies.dataUse.rulesIntro: The specific rules regarding AC's use of Personal Data are set out below:
privacy.policies.dataUse.rule1: All collected data is confidential and for our exclusive use and will not, under any circumstances, be transferred or sold to third parties; therefore, we will not share your Personal Information with third parties without your permission;
privacy.policies.dataUse.rule2: AC may use Personal Information to comply with duly authorized requests for information by government authorities; to comply with any law, regulation, subpoena, or court order; or to help prevent fraud or enforce or protect AC's rights and property;
privacy.policies.dataUse.rule3: The user's email will be used to: send the material or information the data subject requests; send content related to our area of activity; send newsletters, news, events, or other matters that may be of interest to them;
privacy.policies.dataUse.rule4: The data subject may unsubscribe from our mailing list at any time. All emails include an unsubscribe link in the last lines. By clicking this link, the data subject is automatically removed from the list. This website collects information from its visitors not only by asking specific questions, but also by enabling communication via email and forms.
privacy.policies.analytics.title: Google Analytics
privacy.policies.analytics.intro: The website uses Google Analytics features, including marketing and demographic reporting. AC uses this information to:
privacy.policies.analytics.purpose1: help make the website easier to use;
privacy.policies.analytics.purpose2: help users quickly find information, products, and services;
privacy.policies.analytics.purpose3: help create and present content that is more relevant to users and alert them about new products and services offered by the company.
privacy.policies.analytics.moreInfo: If the data subject would like to learn more about how Google uses data generated through the use of our websites, click here for more information.
privacy.policies.consent.title: Consent
privacy.policies.consent.definition: AC processes personal data based on the data subject's consent. Consent is the free, informed, and unequivocal expression through which the data subject authorizes AC to process their data.
privacy.policies.consent.agreement: By using AC's services and providing their personal data, the data subject acknowledges and agrees to the provisions of this Privacy Policy and understands their rights and how to exercise them.
privacy.policies.consent.withdrawal: At any time and at no cost, the data subject may withdraw their consent. It is important to note that withdrawing consent for data processing may make it impossible to properly perform certain website functionality that depends on that processing. Such consequences will be communicated in advance.
privacy.policies.retention.title: Data Retention Period
privacy.policies.retention.content: Personal data collected by AC will be used and stored for as long as necessary to provide the service or to achieve the purposes set out in this policy, taking into account the rights of data subjects and controllers.
privacy.policies.sharing.title: Data Sharing
privacy.policies.sharing.links: The AC website may contain links to other websites. Our privacy policy does not apply to third-party websites; if you visit another website from ours, you should read that website's privacy policy. We are not responsible for the privacy policy or content on those websites.
privacy.policies.sharing.recipients: Recipients receive the data only to the extent necessary to provide the contracted services, and our contracts are guided by data protection rules under Brazilian law and all other jurisdictions where we operate.
privacy.policies.sharing.otherSituations: In addition, there are other situations in which data may be shared, namely:
privacy.policies.sharing.situation1: Legal determination, request, requisition, or court order, with competent judicial, administrative, or governmental authorities;
privacy.policies.sharing.situation2: Corporate transactions, such as merger, acquisition, or incorporation, automatically;
privacy.policies.sharing.situation3: Protection of AC's rights in any type of dispute, including judicial disputes.
privacy.policies.cookies.title: Browsing Data (Cookies)
privacy.policies.cookies.definition: AC uses Cookies, which are text files sent by the platform to the computer, where they are stored, containing information related to browsing the website. In short, Cookies are used to improve the overall user experience.
privacy.policies.cookies.acceptance: By accessing our website and consenting to the use of Cookies, the data subject acknowledges and accepts the use of a system that collects browsing data through Cookies on their device.
privacy.policies.cookies.control: At any time and at no cost, the data subject may change permissions, block or refuse Cookies. However, withdrawing consent for certain Cookies may prevent some platform features from functioning correctly.
privacy.policies.changes.title: Changes to the Privacy Policy
privacy.policies.changes.right: AC reserves the right to modify this policy at any time, especially to reflect any changes made to its website or legislative changes. Any changes will take effect from their publication on our website.
privacy.policies.changes.consent: By using our services and providing personal data after such modifications, the data subject consents. This Privacy Policy may be updated at any time. Therefore, AC recommends periodically accessing the Privacy page. AC is committed to keeping this policy up to date, observing its provisions and ensuring compliance. In addition, it undertakes to seek technical and organizational measures that are reliably capable of protecting the entire data processing operation.
privacy.policies.disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
privacy.policies.disclaimer.intro: AC adopts high security standards to prevent incidents; no online page is entirely risk-free. In this regard, AC is not responsible for:
privacy.policies.disclaimer.responsibili: any consequences arising from users' negligence, imprudence, or lack of expertise regarding their own individual data. AC is responsible only for the security of data processing procedures and for meeting the purposes described in this instrument. We emphasize that responsibility for the confidentiality of access credentials lies with the user;

malicious actions by third parties, such as hacker attacks, except where culpable or deliberate conduct by AC is proven. We emphasize that in the event of security incidents that may generate relevant risk or harm to the data subject or any of our users/clients, we will notify those affected and the relevant regulatory agencies.
privacy.policies.dpo.title: Data Protection Officer (DPO)
privacy.policies.dpo.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or about the personal data we process, the user may contact the Personal Data Protection Officer via email: dpo@angolacables.com, and will be referred to AC's Legal Office (GJU).
privacy.policies.final.title: Final Provisions
privacy.policies.final.monitoring.title: Monitoring
privacy.policies.final.monitoring.conten: GPC, which is responsible for submitting it and any proposed revisions for EC approval.
privacy.policies.final.nonCompliance.con: Failure to comply with what is established in this policy constitutes a serious breach of conduct duties and, as a result, may lead to the application of disciplinary measures, contractual penalties, or potential civil liability.
privacy.policies.final.review.title: Review and Updating
privacy.policies.final.review.content: This policy must be reviewed whenever necessary or whenever relevant changes occur in the IMS, AC's strategic direction, and/or regulation issued by supervisory bodies, to ensure it remains up to date. It is the responsibility of the IMS and GJU to draft and keep this policy up to date and to forward it to the GPC.
privacy.policies.final.disclosure.title: Disclosure and Access
privacy.policies.final.disclosure.conten: This policy should be disclosed to all the employees through the specified internal communication channels and be available for consultation on the website; It is the responsibility of the Planning and Control Office (GPC), the Legal Office (GJU), and the IMS Working Group to assess compliance with the rules of this policy and other internal regulations that complement it in terms of ethical, deontological, and prudential matters.
privacy.policies.final.copies: All the printed copies are considered non-controlled copies. This Policy shall come into force on the date of its publication.
privacy.policies.disclaimerText: This document is provided for informational purposes only and should not be considered as legal advice.
policies.cookies.title: Cookies Policy
policies.cookies.intro.title: Introduction
policies.cookies.intro.p1: Angola Cables S.A., headquartered in Luanda together with its subsidiaries, is responsible for digital Services covered by this Cookies Policy.
policies.cookies.intro.p2: This Policy governs the use of free or paid digital Services offered on all Angola Cables Platforms, Sites and Websites.
policies.cookies.definitions.title: Definitions
policies.cookies.definitions.p1: For the purposes of this Policy, the following definitions apply:
policies.cookies.definitions.services: Services: Any digital service or functionality made available by Angola Cables.
policies.cookies.definitions.platforms: Platforms: Digital environments where the User interacts with Angola Cables Services.
policies.cookies.definitions.users: Users: Any person accessing a digital Service, with or without registration.
policies.cookies.definitions.cookies: Cookies: Small text files sent to the User's browser.
policies.cookies.definitions.otherTech: Other Tracking Technologies: Includes pixel tags, local storage, web beacons and unique identifiers.
policies.cookies.acceptance: BY ACCEPTING THIS POLICY, THE USER DECLARES THAT THEY HAVE READ AND AGREE TO THE TERMS. IF NOT, THEY MUST NOT USE THE SERVICES.
policies.cookies.purpose.title: Purpose
policies.cookies.purpose.p1: Describe the use of cookies and tracking technologies across Angola Cables Platforms and Services.
policies.cookies.whatAre.title: What Are Cookies?
policies.cookies.whatAre.p1: Cookies and similar technologies collect and store information about User interaction with Services.
policies.cookies.whatAre.p2: They are essential for functionality, analytics, personalization and advertising.
policies.cookies.types.title: Types and Purposes of Cookies
policies.cookies.types.intro: Angola Cables uses the following types of cookies:
policies.cookies.types.necessary.title: Strictly Necessary Cookies
policies.cookies.types.necessary.desc: Essential for operation and do not store personally identifiable information.
policies.cookies.types.performance.title: Performance & Analytics Cookies
policies.cookies.types.performance.desc: Measure usage, audience engagement and site performance.
policies.cookies.types.advertising.title: Advertising Cookies
policies.cookies.types.advertising.desc: Used for targeted ads, campaign management and retargeting.
policies.cookies.types.personalization.d: Provide content tailored to User preferences.
policies.cookies.management.title: Managing Cookies
policies.cookies.management.p1: Users may manage cookies through browser or device settings.
policies.cookies.management.browser.dele: Delete specific cookies or all cookies.
policies.cookies.management.browser.aler: Enable alerts when cookies are set.
policies.cookies.management.note: Disabling cookies may affect functionality of certain Services.
policies.cookies.management.mobile.title: Mobile App Management
policies.cookies.management.mobile.p1: Mobile devices allow management via privacy settings or permissions.
policies.cookies.updates.title: Policy Updates
policies.cookies.updates.p1: This Policy may be updated periodically. Significant changes will be communicated.
